glm::fastPow
GLM_FUNC_DECL vec< L, T, Q > fastPow(vec< L, T, Q > const &x)
Faster than the common pow function but less accurate.
glm::fastLog2
GLM_FUNC_DECL vec< L, T, Q > fastLog2(vec< L, T, Q > const &x)
